sources.title: Wake of the Red Witch
sources.description: Title: Wake of the Red Witch Summary: During the 1860s in the South Pacific, Capt. Ralls, skipper of the Red Witch, has a series of adventures involving sunken gold bullion, pearls, natives, an unscrupulous ship owner and a giant octopus. Directed by: Edward Ludwig Actors: John Wayne, Gail Russell, Gig Young Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 1 March 1949 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Captain Ralls fights Dutch shipping magnate Mayrant Sidneye for the woman he loves, Angelique Desaix, and for a fortune in gold aboard the Red Witch.
